II fldgi – wêlrK

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g
wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk
whg m%udKj;a ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka
wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk
úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2014 foieïn¾ ui 26 jeks Èk
m< lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2014 foieïn¾ ui 12 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh
hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&'
2014 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq'- 2014'11'28 osk m< jQ wxl 1"891 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  I : III iy II fldgia m< fkdù h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'12'051810
l¿;r uydêlrKh
1984 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 05 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh
l¿;r uydêlrKfha úNd. fldg wjika fyda le|jd wjika ù j¾I myla ^05& blau f.dia we;s my; wxl ork kvq jd¾;d 2015'03'06 jeks
Èk fm' j' 10'00 g wêlrK N+ñfha § .sks;nd úkdY lsÍug fyda iqÿiq wdh;khlg ndr§fuka úkdY lrkq ,efí'
Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d j, msgm;la fyda fjk;a Bg wod, f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka úiska
fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ta i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o" lsishï kvq jd¾;djla úkdY fkdl<
hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;l= isà kï fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiskau fyda
kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd l<hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh

ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - j;a;,
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mj;sk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o jir 05lg jvd merKs" my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d" jákdlula ke;s
f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a ^479& wêldßh 5 j.ka;sfha úê úOdk j,g wkql+,j 2015'03'05 Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha §
mq¿iaid úkdY lrkq ,nk njg fuhska okajd isáñ'
fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH iïmQ¾K msgm;a fyda f,aLk ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd
2015'03'05 jeks Èkg m%:ufhka fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; ,sÅ;j b,a¨ï l< hq;= nj okajd isáñ'

tlS fjkafoaisfha § by,u ,xiq ;nkakd  .ekqïlre jk w;r"
fjkafoaish wjika jQ jydu .ekqïlre úiska uq¿ .ekqï ñf,ka
25]" uqo,la o" msial,a .dia;= o rchg whúh hq;= .dia;=" ^mjqkaâÊ
.dia;=& ;lafiare .dia;=" fjkafoais .dia;=" 
.eiÜ m;%fha .dia;= iy
mqj;am;aj, m%isoaO lsÍfï úhoï o" wfkl=;a m%pdrl lghq;= i|yd jQ
úhoï o tjf,au uqo,ska ud fj; f.úh hq;= h' fplam;a ndr.kq
fkd,efí' .ekqï ñf,ka 75] l b;sß uqo, Èk 30la we;=,; fld<U
Èid wêlrKfha by; wxl ork kvqjg ;ekam;a l, hq;= h'
Wmf,aLkh
niakdysr m<df;a" .ïmy Èia;%slalfha" ishkE fldarf<a" .Õnv
m;a;=fõ" lsß¢je, m%dfoaYSh iNd iSudfõ" jEfla m%dfoaYSh f,alï
fldÜGdifha" ueoafoa.u .%du ks,Odß jiï wxl 383î" ueoafoa.u
msysá j¾I 1997 la jQ iema;eïn¾ ui 03 jeks Èk ã' ta' úfÊisxy
wjir,;a ñkskafodare ;ek úiska uek ms,sfh, lrk ,o wxl
ví,sõ$1738 ork ie,iqu m%ldr ó.yj;a; bvfuka fnod fjka lrk
,o len,s wxl 01 ork lene,a,g udhsï ( W;=rg iy kef.kysrg (
mdr iy à' ta' Ôj;aydñg wh;a bvu o" ol=Kg ( Ô' ta' whsrdx.kS
fm%au,;d ysñlï lshk bvu o iy niakdysrg ( wkqr .=K;s,l
ysñlï lshk bvu iy mdr o hk fulS udhsï ;=< mssysá rEâ ;=khs"
m¾pia oykjhhs oYu tlla ^w' 0" rE' 3" m¾' 19'1& fylaghd¾ 0'3518 la
úYd, bvu iy th ;=< msysá f.dvke.s,s .yfld< m<;=re we;=¿

frðiag%d¾$idu úksiqre ksfhdacH msial,a"

12-149
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;=j
107 wêldrh jk fkd;dßia wd{dmk;
.d,a, uydêlrK l<dmh ;=, isxy, yd bx.%Sis NdIdj,ska fkd;dßia Oqrfha lghq;= lsÍug n,h,;a fâúâ O¾umd, ùrlafldä
uy;d Oqrfhka b,a,d wiaùu ^fkd;dßia wd{dmkf;a 22 j.ka;sh wkqj& .re rdcH mßmd,k iy iajfoaY lghq;= weu;s;=ud úiska 2014'06'23

rdcH mßmd,k yd iajfoaY

2014 iema;eïn¾ ui 23 jeks Èk"
fld<U § h'
12-45
fkd;dßia wd{dmk; ^m;a lsÍï&
fkd;dßia wd{dmkf;a 05 jeks j.ka;sh hgf;a" rdcH mßmd,k yd
